articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Combined Foodstuff-processing Factory under KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Combined Foodstuff-processing Factory under KPA Unit
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided a field guidance to the foodstuff-processing factory under KPA Unit 534.
					Kim Jong Un looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the unit after being briefed on the factory in front of a map showing its panoramic view.
					
					He looked back with deep emotion on the immortal leadership exploits of leader Kim Jong Il, who initiated the reconstruction of the factory in order to increase the production of varieties of processed foodstuffs including essential foodstuffs for the service personnel and visited it several times when its project was at its height, giving precious instructions to it.
					
					He went round the production control room, e-library and rooms for scientific and technological information.
					
					Then he looked round an essential foodstuff shop, an instant rice shop and various other places of the factory to learn in detail about how production is kept going at a high rate.
					
					To put production processes on an automatic basis at foodstuff factories is an essential requirement for ensuring hygienic safety of foodstuffs.
					
					Looking at varieties of processed food produced at the factory, he gave precious instructions to keep production going at a high rate and improving their quality. 
					
					Supply service means a battle for defending socialism, he noted, adding that the foodstuff factories including this factory are standing at the outpost of supply service, that of the battle for defending socialism.
					
					He told the employees of the factory to bear in mind that they are standing alongside service personnel in the same trench for defending socialism.
					
					He set forth tasks for modernly reconstructing the factory as required by the era of Songun and took measures for carrying out the project with loving care.
					
					He had a photo session with the workers of the factory, expressing expectation and conviction that they would successfully perform their honorable duty.
					
					He was accompanied by Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon and So Hung Chan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits East Coastal Supply Base of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits East Coastal Supply Base of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the supply base on the east coast  under KPA Unit 639.
					He saw persimmons which the officers and employees there have stored with good care since early in winter of 2011 with yearning for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					He listened to the poems created by employees there, missing Kim Jong Il very much.
					
					Kim Jong Un looked round different places including public bath, dining room, rest room and refrigerating chamber to acquaint himself with the management activities and business method in the supply base.
					
					He recalled that the base caught a lot of fishes and supplied them to servicepersons and people last year, too, true to his intention, praising it as an enterprise helpful to him.
					
					After being told that the secret of the success lay in actively galvanizing the mental power of the employees, directing efforts to the supply service and putting fishing operations on a scientific basis, cutting down the time of boats' anchorage and consolidating the repair base, he urged other fishery bases to follow the working style and experience of the officials at that unit.
					
					He toured the repair base of fishing boats there.
					
					He was satisfied to learn about the technical specification of the horizontal and vertical shoal finding machine aboard a 200 h.p. fishing boat and the use of spent fuel there.
					
					He was very pleased to hear that the base keeps boats operating not by the method of repairing boats when they go wrong but by the method of always keeping a spare engine for replacing any one out of order with it in a short span of time. 
					
					He spared time to meet with a couple of lathe operators working together in the same shop and appreciated their efforts.
					
					The supply base is a model for the whole army, he noted, highly appreciating its success and extending thanks to it on behalf of the Party Central Committee.
					
					Expressing his conviction that the officers, soldiers and employees of the base would serve the country and its people better, he gave a pair of binoculars, automatic rifle and machine gun to the sub-unit directly under the unit as gifts and had a photo session with them. 
					
					He was accompanied by Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon and So Hung Chan.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Jordanian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Jordanian King
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Abdullah II, king of Jordan, on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of its independence.
					The message expressed belief that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger, wishing the Jordanian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Chairman of AU Committee
articles.content:
Greetings to Chairman of AU Committee
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, chairman of the Committee of the African Union (AU), on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of AU.
					The message said that over the past five decades AU has made great contributions to powerfully encouraging the African people in their effort to strengthen solidarity, solve the continental issue by themselves without foreign interference and achieve regional peace and stability and socio-economic progress.
					
					It expressed conviction that the current events marking the 50th anniversary of AU will mark an epochal occasion in making a great step forward to unity and cohesion, prosperity and peace of the African continent in line with the common aspiration and desire of the people in the region to meet worldwide challenges with their concerted efforts.
					
					Reiterating the invariable stand of the DPRK government to steadily consolidate the long-standing traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with AU and its member nations, the message sincerely hoped that AU will strengthen and the chairman of the AU Committee will make greater successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK Will Closely Follow Park Geun Hye's Future Behavior
articles.content:
DPRK Will Closely Follow Park Geun Hye's Future Behavior
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission issued the following statement on Saturday:
					Park Geun Hye, puppet president of south Korea, openly revealed her sinister intention to stand in confrontation with the DPRK again on Thursday. 
					
					When meeting with the director of the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies and his party that day, she said that the north has played a "game" escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula. Recently she was so pitiful as to coquettishly behave, blustering that the north is attempting a new "gamble" called new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					Personally hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, she made such reckless remarks as uttering the north cannot succeed in implementing the above-said line. She foolishly tried to shift the responsibility for having strained the overall situation on the Korean Peninsula onto the north. 
					
					It is not the first time that she made such reckless remarks. 
					
					She has kicked up confrontation hysteria seriously rattling the nerves of the north through a spate of malignant invectives and sheer sophism since she was busy with a shameful presidential campaign. 
					
					Recently, she orchestrated a reckless confrontation charade in collusion with her American master during her U.S. junket, not content with staging such political burlesque in the corrupt south Korean society, unaware of domestic and foreign public criticism of her. 
					
					Now that she can no longer hide her heinous confrontation stance towards the north, we cannot but argue about this. 
					
					There is an old adage that an ignorant person had better not pretend to know anything and one should not dare mouth anything one does not know. Such mouthing is bound to reveal ignorance and reckless tongue-lashing causes unpredictable trouble. 
					
					The same can be said of her rigmarole slandering the above-said line of the north. 
					
					As far as this line is concerned, it is a great inheritance of the line on simultaneously developing the economy and defence up-building laid down by the DPRK to cope with the grave situation in the 1960s of the last century as it developed the line at a new stage as required by the prevailing situation on the eve of a war created by the U.S.
					
					This is the line which no other country in the world can ever advance. Thanks to this line the army and people of the DPRK are building a socialist land of bliss desired by all people and it is demonstrating its might as a political and ideological power, military power and nuclear weapons state envied by world people and feared by enemies. 
					
					It is thanks to this strategic line that the DPRK has reliably protected the sovereignty of the nation and dignity and security of the people from the U.S. constant nuclear blackmail and moves for aggression. 
					
					It is Park Geun Hye who does not know at all the great meaning and tremendous weight of this strategic line the justice and vitality of which have been irrefutably proved for decades. 
					
					That is why she dared let loose such vituperation as "south Korea cannot allow nukes of the north," "the north should opt for making a switchover by dismantling its nukes first" and "the north cannot keep its inhabitants alive with nukes". She went the lengths of terming the above-said line a gamble.
					
					Being in the presidential office, she ought to know about the other party's policy to a certain extent. She had better buckle down to grasping the level of its military preparedness before learning how to change her skirt into trousers and change her civilian dress into a military uniform.
					
					Not a long period has passed since Park came to Chongwadae, but there are too many examples to cite to reveal the true colors as a confrontation-minded element.
					
					Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we cannot but draw attention to the present ruling quarters of south Korea including Park Geun Hye. 
					
					Confrontation hysteria against us and whole string of invectives against us will only bring disgrace and destruction to them. 
					
					Park Geun Hye and present south Korean ruling quarters would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and stop their anachronistic actions swimming against it. 
					
					She will never escape the same unfortunate fate as that of the successive puppet presidents of south Korea if she goes busy reviving "the yusin" dictatorship and fascist dictatorship and gets frantic with the moves to sell off  the dignity of the nation to outside forces and escalate the confrontation with compatriots as now. 
					
					She should seriously recollect why the "yusin" dictator was shot to death and why her predecessor Lee Myung Bak is being treated as a man more dead than alive. 
					
					We will closely follow the future behaviors of the present ruling quarters of south Korea including Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: New Moxibustion Appliance Developed
articles.content:
New Moxibustion Appliance Developed
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Koryo Medicine of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed a new kind of moxibustion appliance.
					The appliance is made with mixed powders of wormwood, rare earth mineral and Kumgang medicinal stone, which emit heat, electronic radiation and far infrared rays, when burnt. The compound rays help improve circulation of blood, activate metabolism and enhance immunity in human body.
					
					This portable appliance can adjust its operational temperature and time to suit the diseases.
					
					It is efficacious for bronchial asthma, hypertension, hypotension, cardiac neurosis, stomach and duodenal ulcer, etc.
					
					Sliced ginger and garlic are usually put on the spots of acupuncture to get a better effectiveness of the appliance.
					
					Paek Kum Sang, a researcher of the Academy, told KCNA that the new appliance gives desirable effect to the regions of acupuncture more quickly than the existing ones.

articles.title: No One Will Benefit from Rising Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
No One Will Benefit from Rising Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Japanese defense minister recently said the U.S.-south Korea combined exercises would serve as a deterrent to the DPRK. He also spoke out about the importance of increasing the sense of existence of U.S. troops in East Asia.
					These remarks reveal his black-hearted intention to incite all the worst hostility towards the DPRK in pursuit of Washington.
					
					As already reported, those war-like forces in Washington and Seoul staged combined naval exercises against Pyongyang with huge armed forces such as a super-large nuclear-powered carrier flotilla capable of carrying out a nuclear war involved. They also waged other military drills of different missions. This is one more threat and blackmail against the DPRK and the worst military provocation to ignite a nuclear war against it at any cost.
					
					The U.S. and its south Korean puppet regime wage frantic military drills in succession in a desperate effort to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					This has an adverse impact on the development of the situation in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					Now that Washington is seeking to strike the DPRK with south Korea as a strategic stronghold and put the Asia-Pacific region under its control by force of arms, the tension on the peninsula will flare up all over the region and the escalating danger of war will develop just to that threatening the region.
					
					It is nonsense to claim deescalating the tension in the region without defusing the tension on the peninsula.
					
					In a word, the screwing up of tension on the peninsula will benefit no one.
					
					The unbiased world opinion condemned Washington as a main architect of the provocation of a nuclear war on the peninsula and a very cause of disturbing the peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					Contrary to the fact, Japan fans up the atmosphere of hostility towards the DPRK in a sinister aim.
					
					Japan further bolsters up its "Self-Defense Forces" and puts spurs to the "law revision" for going militarism under the pretext of the DPRK's nuclear weapons and missiles.
					
					It uses the tension on the peninsula as a justification for military actions for converting Japan into a militarist state and starting overseas aggression.
					
					If a war breaks out on the peninsula, Japan, which is the U.S. overseas logistic base will also suffer.
					
					In the light of such a simple logic, will it be normal for Japan to stir tension on the peninsula?
					
					More reasonable thinking will be beneficial to Japan itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Poor Human Rights Record in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Poor Human Rights Record in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The people's democratic freedom and rights are being ruthlessly violated in south Korea, says  Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					In south Korea the toiling masses are denied political rights under the domination of outside forces.
					
					Having installed puppet regimes in south Korea, the U.S. has consolidated its foundation there. It has prodded its lackeys into brutally suppressing the south Koreans' just actions for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					Not a few of them are killed by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and suffer disasters due to their crimes, but they have no one to hear their complaints. 
					
					Only a tiny handful of the privileged class is granted freedom and rights whereas majority of working people are denied them in south Korea.
					
					South Korea has the worst human rights record as the toiling masses' independent rights are wantonly violated by law.
					
					Such being a hard reality, the south Korean puppet forces claim that there is no problem in their human rights performance. They are busy kicking up a smear campaign against the DPRK over its "human rights problem," a fiction. 
					
					Lurking behind this campaign is an intention to cover up their crimes against humanity by turning south Korea into a tundra of human rights and realize the wild ambition for the "unification of social systems" under the absurd pretext of the "human rights problem in the north." 
					
					With no rhetoric can the puppet forces misrepresent the situation of the DPRK where the popular masses enjoy a worthwhile life, exercising their true political freedom and rights as masters of the state and society.

articles.title: S. Korean Security Authorities Accused of Their Repressive Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Security Authorities Accused of Their Repressive Action
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Youth Solidarity of south Korea released a statement on Monday denouncing the puppet security authorities for their unreasonable suppression.
					The statement recalled that the Kwanak Police Station in Seoul on May 17 arrested a young man who is a member of the Youth Solidarity and the Seoul Solidarity for Civil Rights on suspicion that he staged a demonstration in front of the house of Won Se Hun, former director of the Intelligence Service.
					
					The security authorities cited an unclear image shown by a monitoring camera as evidence, it said, adding it is retaliation against a progressive organization which exposed the Intelligence Service's illegal interference in politics.
					
					It bitterly condemned the security authorities for arresting the innocent young man without any reason and encroaching upon his private life, stressing that in case such act persists in the future, they will face stronger resistance of all people.

articles.title: S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flayed
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, at a meeting in a press institution on May 21 took issue with the DPRK again, talking about "its repeated attempts at provocation". He was so impudent as to admonish that "the north should make a strategic option".
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					His remarks are a revelation of his sinister scheme to term the DPRK a "provoker" in a bid to evade the blame for the present tension and realize the ambition for "inducing the north to change".
					
					The DPRK's declaration of an all-out action against the U.S. and measures for bolstering up nuclear deterrent are an exercise of the legitimate right to defend the sovereignty of the country and the security of the nation in order to cope with the reckless moves of the U.S. and puppet south Korean regime which are keen on the hostile acts against the DPRK by brandishing a sword for invading it.
					
					However, vocal about "provocation from the north", the puppet group cannot cover up the essence of the situation on the Korean Peninsula nor evade the blame for the tension.
					
					The group is often talking about "confidence-building process", advertising it as a new "policy toward the north" but it is nothing but an anti-reunification policy for confrontation little short of traitor Lee Myung Bak's watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars".
					
					Pressure and honeyed words can never make the army and people of the DPRK change their faith and option.
					
					The puppet group should clearly know that its persistent rackets for confrontation with the DPRK will precipitate its miserable end.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Pro-Japanese Humiliating Act Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Pro-Japanese Humiliating Act Slammed
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Tuesday carried an article accusing the puppet authorities of their pro-Japanese humiliating act.
					The article referred to the reckless remarks made by Japanese politicians. Typical of them are the continued remarks made by Osaka Mayor Hashimoto, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, justifying the past sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, it said, terming it a serious provocation.
					
					But the present regime remains a passive onlooker at the remarks, waiting for Japan's change of its attitude, the article said, adding all people feel humiliated. 
					
					It urged the authorities not to lament and express regret at Japan's remarks any longer but take concrete and substantial countermeasures.
					
					Peace cannot be realized in Northeast Asia as long as Japan continues to distort history, the article stressed.

articles.title: Thorough Investigation into Scandals of Lee Myung Bak and His Family Members Called for
articles.content:
Thorough Investigation into Scandals of Lee Myung Bak's Family Urged
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea in a commentary on Wednesday pushed for a probe into the truth about scandals committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak and his family members.
					The commentary recalled that the former chief of the guard office and administrator of Chongwadae who had been prosecuted for their involvement in the case of purchasing a housing lot in Naegok-dong were declared guilty at the trial on an appeal on Tuesday.
					
					However, an investigation of Lee Myung Bak, the prime suspect in the case, has not yet been made as the prosecution studied his face, it said.
					
					It recalled that in March last the organization filed a suit with the prosecution against Lee and his family on suspicion of their scandals.
					
					The prosecution has not made any investigation into the case, far from summoning the chief culprit of the case for questioning, it noted, demanding a thorough-going investigation into the case.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Urged
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea, including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, held a rally outside the U.S. military base in Ryongsan on Wednesday.
					At the rally speakers recalled they stage actions demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea every Wednesday to oppose war and achieve durable peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The outcome of the south Korean chief executive's trip to the U.S. showed that it was only aimed to tighten the shackling alliance with the U.S. and the issue of achieving peace, the most crucial matter, was not handled during the visit, they charged, and continued:
					
					The tightened alliance for aggression, hostile acts against the north and ceaseless military exercises would only escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					In order to tide over the crisis on the peninsula, it is necessary to conclude a peace treaty at an early date and urge the U.S. forces to quit south Korea which they regard as their backyard.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Japan staying in the socialist homeland visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					They laid bouquets before the statues of the great Generalissimos in boundless reverence for them who performed undying feats for the development of Chongryon, and made a bow.

articles.title: British Organizations Accuse S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Pro-Reunification Forces
articles.content:
British Organizations Accuse S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Pro-Reunification Forces
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on May 14 in denunciation of the south Korean regime for suppressing the pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					The statement expressed indignation at the south Korean fascist rulers pushing forward the institution of a law on forcibly dissolving the patriotic reunification movement organizations, including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					
					The fascist regime of south Korea is throwing pro-reunification patriots behind bars and now attempting to forcibly disband their organizations struggling to implement the north-south agreements including the June 15 joint declaration, it said, adding:
					
					This fully shows that south Korea is a barren land of freedom and democracy and the puppet fascist regime is the enemy of the national reunification.
					
					The south Korean puppet forces are the group of traitors brandishing fascist bayonet against the pro-reunification patriotic organizations, being bent on sycophancy toward the U.S.
					
					In south Korea the forces advocating cooperation with the compatriots are being trampled down with violence and the traitors and those currying favor with Yankees are being praised.
					
					The statement vehemently denounced the fascist violence by the south Korean puppet forces to trample down the pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					
					It called for dynamically conducting the worldwide movement to defend the pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Is Strong in Independence: Indian Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Is Strong in Independence: Indian Personage
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Indian paper People's Democracy carried an article titled "DPRK vs. shrinking U.S." contributed by Suneet Chopra, secretary general of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association who is a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist).
					The article said:
					
					The Korean revolution pioneered by President Kim Il Sung was brilliantly carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and is now making victorious advance thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The DPRK is strong in independence.
					
					So, all the attempts of the imperialists to stifle the country could not but go bankrupt.
					
					The U.S. more desperately moved to stifle the DPRK when the latter successfully launched a satellite last year.
					
					To cope with the provocation by the former, the latter showed in its practical action how to protect the sovereignty.
					
					The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK before staging with its allies unprecedentedly large war drills targeting the DPRK.
					
					However, the DPRK couldn't pardon those war drills as it is strong in independence.
					
					It declared at home and abroad that the inter-Korean relations enter war-time state and nullified the Armistice Agreement which had existed for 60 years.
					
					It is admirable that the Korean people armed with the Songun idea are boldly countering the provocation by the U.S. and its allies.
					
					We will as ever stand on the side of the Korean people who are struggling to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's War Victory to Be Celebrated in Malaysia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's War Victory to Be Celebrated in Malaysia
Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian preparatory committee was inaugurated at the Dombo Enterprise Company on May 19 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					The director of the company was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee fixed the days from May 19 to late July as a celebration period and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events like film show, lecture and photo exhibition.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el 50o aniversario de la UA
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el 50o aniversario de la UA
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente del Comite de la Union Africana, Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, con motivo del 50o aniversario de fundacion de la UA. 
					El remitente senala que durante el historico lapso de medio siglo, la UA hizo gran aporte a estimular mucho la lucha de los pueblos africanos por fortalecer la unidad, resolver los problemas del continente por cuenta propia y sin injerencia extranjera y alcanzar la paz, la estabilidad y el progreso socioeconomico de la region. 
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que el acto conmemorativo de esa efemeride sera un motivo de viraje en la marcha del continente africano hacia la unificacion, la unidad, la prosperidad y la paz, conforme a la aspiracion comun y deseo de los pueblos regionales de hacer frente a los desafios mundiales con las fuerzas unidas. 
					
					Reafirma la invariable posicion del gobierno coreano de consolidar y desarrollar constantemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la UA y los paises miembros y desea al destinatario el desarrollo de la UA y mayores exitos en sus trabajos responsables.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia  mensaje de felicitacion a Abdullah II
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia  mensaje de felicitacion a Abdullah II
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este sabado un mensaje de felicitacion al rey del Reino Hachemita de Jordania, Abdullah II, con motivo del 67o aniversario de la independencia de este pais. 
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y desea al pueblo de Jordania mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: ACNC comenta reciente disparate del ministro de Defensa de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC comenta reciente disparate del ministro de Defensa de Japon
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Defensa de Japon dijo que "los ejercicios conjuntos Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea seran un disuasivo frente al Norte de Corea" y "es muy importante dar destaque a la presencia militar norteamericana en Asia Oriental".
					Esas palabras dejan conocer que el trata de acentuar el clima hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea coordinando los pasos con EE.UU. que continua empeorando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Como saben todos, EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos desarrollaron recientemente los ejercicios navales conjuntos y otras maniobras movilizando enormes fuerzas armadas de agresion, inclusive la flotilla de portaaviones nuclear Nimitz, capaces de ejecutar una entera guerra. Esto significa otra amenaza y chantaje contra la RPDC y grave provocacion militar encaminada a desencadenar a toda costa la guerra nuclear contra ella.
					
					Tales movimientos militares influencian negativamente en la evolucion de la situacion regional de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Dado que EE.UU. intenta atacar a la RPDC usando el Sur de Corea como base militar estrategica y dominar con fuerzas la region de Asia-Pacifico, la escalada de tensiones y peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana produce la misma en toda la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Entonces, seria ilogico mejorar la situacion regional sin relajar el estado de tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En una palabra, no conviene a nadie el empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La imparcial opinion publica alza su voz de denuncia a EE.UU. que pretende desatar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y perturba la paz del Nordeste de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Por su parte, Japon trata de fomentar la atmosfera hostil a la RPDC con el objetivo de fortalecer, bajo el pretexto de armas nucleares y misil de la segunda, sus "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" e impulsar la "enmienda de ley" que viabilice la militarizacion.
					
					So pretexto de la tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, Japon justifica sus acciones para la militarizacion y agresion a ultramar.
					
					Si estalla la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, sera devastado simultaneamente Japon que sirve de base de logistica de EE.UU.
					
					Convendria tambien a Japon examinar seriamente si le conviene o no fomentar las tensiones de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun censura disparates conflictivos de Yun Pyong Se
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun censura disparates conflictivos de Yun Pyong Se
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- En un encuentro de prensa concedido el pasado dia 21, Yun Pyong Se, ministro titere de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, volvio a difamar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de "incesante intencion de provocacion" y hablando  que el "Norte debe tomar la opcion estrategica".
					En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que tal proceder es la manifestacion de su malsana intencion de eludir la responsabilidad del actual estado tenso al calificar la RPDC de "provocadora" y realizar el "cambio del Norte", y prosigue:
					
					La RPDC declaro el enfrentamiento total antiyanqui y tomo las medidas de consolidar el disuasivo nuclear, lo cual es el ejercicio de legitimo derecho a autodefensa para preservar la soberania del pais y la seguridad de la nacion frente a las imprudentes maquinaciones anti-RPDC del imperio yanqui y los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Aunque los titeres vociferan de la "provocacion del Norte", no podran tergiversar la esencia de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana ni liberarse de la responsabilidad de la presente fase aguda.
					
					Los titeres suelen hablar del "proceso de confianza" y lo divulgan como si fuera nueva "politica sobre el Norte", pero tal proceso es la politica conflictiva anti-reunificacion identica  a la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 000 dolares" preconizada por el traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo no cambiaran jamas su confianza y opcion.
					
					Los titeres deben saber correctamente que cuanto mas recurran a la confrontacion anti-RPDC, se adelantara tanto mas la autodestruccion de si mismos.
